answers.answer: If I remember correctly, the drink wasn't too nasty, more like flat orange soda.  I was just so hungry from fasting that I would eat or drink anything at that point.  I am nervous for mine, as well.  I am 22 weeks, I think it's my next appt.

The drink wasn't bad to me.  Like the previous post...orange soda without the bubbles...I kinda liked it but also like the previous poster...I would have consumed just about anything at that point...LOLYou'll do fine...Many prayers your way for a healthy result.

I didn't have to fast either. Mine went fine. I hate carbonated beverages ans sweet drinks but the drink they give you was not as bad as I thought. I was expecting the worst, but it wasn't too bad. It was cold and pretty sweet, but not too bad. The hour wait was anoying, but overall it was a lot easier than I thought it would be.

Actually you are not to fast with the one hour glucose test but you are to fast with the 3 hour. I had mine done Monday morning early and did not want to drink that nasty stuff on an empty stomach so I had buttered toast and a big glass of milk and was called yesterday to say I passed the test. You need to have a level under 140 and I was at 102. So I suggest eating something light.
THanks for your post! The drink wasnt too bad, it tasted like fruit punch, my nurse said no call means good news so lets hope i dont get a call :-)Thanks again!
